item.title: Hollywood's best bromances
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> The Hollywood bromance: It's something we're seeing more and more of, especially now that Patrick Stewart and Ian McKellen have taken social media by storm with photos of their adventures in New York, like this one from Coney Island . It was taken after they shot next summer's "X-Men: Days of Future Past" together, and, oh yeah, after McKellen officiated Stewart's wedding . Their's is far from the only Hollywood bromance, however ... Loading weather data ...
